snippet: Novak Djokovic heads into the Paris Masters with his No. 1 ranking under serious threat from Andy Murray, and in the rare position of being second favorite....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic heads into the Paris Masters with his No. 1 ranking under serious threat from Andy Murray, and in the rare position of being second favorite.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Under Threat From Murray Heading Into Paris Masters
headline.main: Djokovic Under Threat From Murray Heading Into Paris Masters
